message: Dainell, nearly everyone who has had problems on a vegan diet I've spoken has done so because they aren't doing it properly or their body had issues with iron. Sounds like you had issues absorbing iron and possibly you weren't taking B12 supplements. As as for B12, it's not just vegans having issues with B12, farm animals are having to be injected with it because they are no longer getting enough either as farming methods have depleted the supply of it from our soil.
And they're going to do WHAT exactly to us? The fool can't feed his own people, how's he going to face us? Venezuelans were foolish during the past dictatorship they're fools now too.
